synopsis.text:
Land mark amusement parks, mysterious encounters, and a transformation that alters a young man's life forever - this two-hour anime special marks two decades of thrilling broadcasts by revisiting the origins of its captivating storyline.

The tale unfolds as the brilliant high school detective, Shinichi, plans a romantic rendezvous with his sweetheart, Ran, at the vibrant Tropical Land amusement park. However, fate has a different plan in store for him. Shinichi's life takes an unexpected turn when he crosses paths with the enigmatic Gin and his associates within the park's bustling grounds.

This commemorative special delves into the events that led to Shinichi's inexplicable metamorphosis into a child's body, presenting a fresh perspective on the familiar narrative. Complete with never-before-seen scenes that deviate from the original manga and anime episode, this reimagining invites viewers to embark on a nostalgic journey while uncovering new facets of the beloved series. Prepare to be enthralled by this engaging celebration of an iconic anime's enduring legacy.
